long_description: Riders looking to take their skills to the next level will enjoy the fit and feel of the Ride LXh snowboard bindings. Foundation medium-flexing chassis are contoured and profiled for lightweight precision; quick-adjust heel-cup design allows micro-adjustments in seconds. Comfortable footbeds with EVA shock pads grip boots, damp vibrations and absorb shock from landings. Women's DaLux highbacks balance control and support with softer top-flex; women-specific, ergonomic design features shorter highbacks than men's and extra flare at top. Rad ankle straps offer a comfortable fit for all-day shred sessions. Convertible ThinGrip toe straps with lightweight rubber webbing can be worn across the top or over the front of boots to hold you in tight; you can change positions on the fly. Women's LXh snowboard bindings feature AstroGlyde CP ratchets made of super-tough composite material that stands up to wear and tear. These bindings are compatible with Burton The Channel snowboards, disc conversion kit is sold separately.
